main.name: Chase Shelton
main.description: Problem Solver. Critical Thinker. Getting better 1 String at a time
main.bio: Hi! My name is Chase and I am a full-stack developer. I have spent the last year and a half fine tuning and growing my skills. I have worked on a variety of projects including a B2B Portal used by a variety of Fortune 500 companies. I have experience working with Javascript/React, Typescript/Angular, PHP/Laravel, and Java. I am looking forward to continuing to learn, grow, and build some great software each and every day!

education.description: The Web Developer Bootcamp is a 3-month, full-time training program for aspiring web developers. The curriculum was designed in collaboration with local technology employers to prepare individuals to dive into a career in web development. The intense training program is designed to take students from the basics of programming to competency in building modern web applications. It includes over 500 hours of hands-on training, gaining experience while building 10+ software projects in an Agile environment, using GitHub, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, React, PHP, SQL, Laravel, and more.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Collaborating with an Agile team to build, maintain, and enhance a B2B Portal built with Angular and Java. Collaborated with teammates to build a suite of 1200 automated tests that ran daily to ensure proper functionailty of the software. Worked with teammates to build an Angular front end from vanilly Typescript. Worked to maintain code for functionality with multiple types of relational databases.
